title: Plex search can now include content from Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, other services
content:
Plex started off as a self-hosted media streaming solution, allowing people to create their own servers with movies, TV shows, and music and share access with others. The service has expanded over the past few years to include ad-supported movies and TV from Plex itself, and now Plex will organize media from other services alongside

The post Plex search can now include content from Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, other services appeared first on xda-developers.

The service has expanded over the past few years to include ad-supported movies and TV from Plex itself, and now Plex will organize media from other services alongside
